alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Henderson; Kaufman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 2:49PM CDT until June 13 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Kaufman County in north central Texas... Northwestern Henderson County in central Texas... Northeastern Ellis County in north central Texas... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 249 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Red Oak, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Ennis, Red Oak, Ferris, Tool, Palmer, Seven Points, Kemp, Grays Prairie, Cottonwood, Flag Lake, Cedar Creek Reservoir, Scurry, Bristol, Pecan Hill, Oak Grove, Rosser, Tolosa, Rockett, Telico and Stubbs. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 254 and 266. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
